wikipedia_page.main: Peter Ashley Abbott (born 1 October 1953 in Rotherham, South Yorkshire) is an English former professional footballer who played in the Football League, as a forward.

response: Abbott was commissioned into the Royal Navy in 1964.Admiral Sir Peter Abbott  Debretts He commanded the minesweeper, , from 1972 to 1975 and then joined the staff of the Senior Naval Officer in the West Indies.
